modName: Spooky Edits - Darker Auriel's Bow and Bloodcursed - Sunhallowed arrows
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] I quite liked the look of this bow, but found it a bit bright (shock :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] You can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] [/b]I use an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url], alongside hundreds of other mods :P
